{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Civil Engineer",
  "description": "PrisDav Consulting, represented by Olafimihan Akiula with office at No: 38 Opebi Road Adebola House (Suite 100, Rear Wing) Ikeja, Lagos. PrisDav Consulting was established as a consortium of experts in Management Consultants and Human Resources Development with particular focus on Executive Search/Staff Selection &amp; Placement, Learning &amp; Development and Human Resources consulting services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Civil Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Projects / Construction
Reports To: Project Manager/Head of Construction

Job Summary


	The Civil Engineer will be responsible for planning, designing, supervising, and executing construction projects under the company&rsquo;s real estate portfolio.
	The role ensures that building structures meet architectural standards, quality specifications, cost efficiency, and regulatory compliance.
	The candidate will coordinate sites, contractors, materials, and ensure timely delivery of projects.


Key Responsibilities
Project Planning &amp; Execution:


	Develop, interpret, and review building plans, structural drawings, and project designs.
	Plan and monitor project schedules, manpower, materials, and cost estimates.
	Handle site layout, foundation design, structural support systems, drainage, and finishing stages.
	Supervise ongoing construction work to ensure alignment with design, quality standards, and timelines.
	Coordinate with architects, surveyors, MEP engineers, vendors, and contractors.


Quality, Safety &amp; Compliance:


	Ensure materials and workmanship comply with building codes and standards.
	Conduct regular site inspections, testing, and quality assurance checks.
	Enforce safety standards and risk management procedures on site.
	Liaise with regulatory authorities to obtain approvals, permits, and inspections.


Contractor &amp; Resource Management:


	Evaluate subcontractor performance and manage site labour.
	Measure work progress for valuation, bill of quantities (BOQ), and certification of payment.
	Prepare daily/weekly progress reports and submit updates to management.
	Recommend cost-saving methods and innovative engineering solutions.


Technical &amp; Administrative Duties:


	Prepare work drawings, structural calculations, and site documentation.
	Manage procurement and materials usage to prevent stock wastage.
	Resolve technical and structural issues during construction execution.
	Support project handover, snag listing, and completion documentation.


Qualifications &amp; Requirements


	B.Sc. / HND in Civil Engineering or related field.
	Minimum 3&ndash;5 years of site experience in Real Estate / Building Construction.
	COREN Certification or professional membership is an added advantage.
	Strong knowledge of structural design, BOQ preparation, and construction materials.
	Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, MS Project or similar engineering tools.
	Excellent problem-solving ability and attention to detail.
	Ability to lead site teams and manage multiple projects simultaneously.


Key Competencies:


	Project Management &amp; Site Supervision
	Technical &amp; Structural Analysis
	Quality Assurance &amp; Cost Control.
	Communication &amp; Contractor Coordination
	Safety Compliance &amp; Documentation
	Time management &amp; Multi-project handling.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;pdc@prisdavconsulting.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only qualified applicants will be contacted.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-13",

Civil Engineer Job at PrisDav Consulting




        
    

        
        PrisDav Consulting, represented by Olafimihan Akiula with office at No: 38 Opebi Road Adebola House (Suite 100, Rear Wing) Ikeja, Lagos. PrisDav Consulting was established as a consortium of experts in Management Consultants and Human Resources Development with particular focus on Executive Search/Staff Selection & Placement, Learning & Development and Human Resources consulting services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Civil Engineer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Projects / Construction
Reports To: Project Manager/Head of Construction

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Civil Engineer will be responsible for planning, designing, supervising, and executing construction projects under the company’s real estate portfolio.
	The role ensures that building structures meet architectural standards, quality specifications, cost efficiency, and regulatory compliance.
	The candidate will coordinate sites, contractors, materials, and ensure timely delivery of projects.


Key Responsibilities
Project Planning & Execution:


	Develop, interpret, and review building plans, structural drawings, and project designs.
	Plan and monitor project schedules, manpower, materials, and cost estimates.
	Handle site layout, foundation design, structural support systems, drainage, and finishing stages.
	Supervise ongoing construction work to ensure alignment with design, quality standards, and timelines.
	Coordinate with architects, surveyors, MEP engineers, vendors, and contractors.


Quality, Safety & Compliance:


	Ensure materials and workmanship comply with building codes and standards.
	Conduct regular site inspections, testing, and quality assurance checks.
	Enforce safety standards and risk management procedures on site.
	Liaise with regulatory authorities to obtain approvals, permits, and inspections.


Contractor & Resource Management:


	Evaluate subcontractor performance and manage site labour.
	Measure work progress for valuation, bill of quantities (BOQ), and certification of payment.
	Prepare daily/weekly progress reports and submit updates to management.
	Recommend cost-saving methods and innovative engineering solutions.


Technical & Administrative Duties:


	Prepare work drawings, structural calculations, and site documentation.
	Manage procurement and materials usage to prevent stock wastage.
	Resolve technical and structural issues during construction execution.
	Support project handover, snag listing, and completion documentation.


Qualifications & Requirements


	B.Sc. / HND in Civil Engineering or related field.
	Minimum 3–5 years of site experience in Real Estate / Building Construction.
	COREN Certification or professional membership is an added advantage.
	Strong knowledge of structural design, BOQ preparation, and construction materials.
	Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, MS Project or similar engineering tools.
	Excellent problem-solving ability and attention to detail.
	Ability to lead site teams and manage multiple projects simultaneously.


Key Competencies:


	Project Management & Site Supervision
	Technical & Structural Analysis
	Quality Assurance & Cost Control.
	Communication & Contractor Coordination
	Safety Compliance & Documentation
	Time management & Multi-project handling.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: pdc@prisdavconsulting.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only qualified applicants will be contacted.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Field Engineer",
  "description": "Cobranet Limited; a reputable organization incorporated in 2003 and provides internet solutions. Our footprint and range of products have grown immensely since incorporation and we are proud to provide every segment of society with a reliable link to the digital universe.

Our entire network topology is rugged, dynamic and fully redundant with negligible downtimes: content showing extremely high availability exceeding 99.5%. Our promise is to continue providing innovative solutions at the best feature-to-price and service-to-price ratio.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Field Engineer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Qualification and Skills


	High school diploma or equivalent; technical certifications or degree in a related field is a plus.
	Proven experience in network installations, preferably within an ISP or telecommunications environment.
	Strong knowledge of networking concepts, protocols, and equipment, such as routers, switches, modems, and cabling.
	Proficiency in troubleshooting network connectivity issues and resolving technical problems.
	Familiarity with various operating systems (Windows, Linux, macOS) and network diagnostic tools.
	Excellent communication and customer service skills to interact effectively with customers and internal teams.
	Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines in a field environment.
	Valid driver&#39;s license and willingness to travel to customer sites as required.
	Physical ability to lift and move networking equipment during installations.


Key Responsibilities
Installation and Configuration:


	Attending to customer premises to install and configure ISP services, including internet connectivity, routers, modems, and other networking equipment.
	Follow installation guidelines, technical specifications, and company procedures to ensure accurate setup and connectivity.
	Test and verify the performance of installed services to ensure they meet the desired speed, reliability, and quality standards.
	Educate customers on the proper use and maintenance of the installed equipment and services.


Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution:


	Diagnose and resolve technical issues related to network connectivity, equipment malfunction, or service disruptions.
	Respond to customer complaints or service requests in a timely manner and provide effective solutions to address their concerns.
	Collaborate with internal teams, such as coordinators, network operations and support, to escalate and resolve complex issues when necessary.
	Maintain detailed documentation of customer interactions, service requests, and problem resolutions.


Customer Service and Communication:


	Interact professionally and courteously with customers, ensuring a positive customer experience during the installation process.
	Communicate technical information to customers in a clear and understandable manner, addressing any questions or concerns they may have.
	Provide recommendations for improving network performance, equipment upgrades, or additional services based on customer requirements and industry best practices.
	Collaborate with sales teams or account managers to gather customer feedback and identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling services.


Quality Assurance and Compliance:


	Ensure installations are completed according to company standards, policies, and regulatory requirements.
	Perform regular audits and quality checks on installed services to identify any deficiencies and implement corrective actions.
	Stay updated with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices related to ISP installations to enhance service delivery and customer satisfaction.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and&nbsp;qualified&nbsp;candidates should send their CV&nbsp;to:&nbsp;recruitment@cobranet.ng&nbsp;using &quot;Field Engineer&quot; as the subject of the mail.

Note:&nbsp;Only qualified candidates will be shortlisted.",

Field Engineer Job at Cobranet Limited




        
    

        
        Cobranet Limited; a reputable organization incorporated in 2003 and provides internet solutions. Our footprint and range of products have grown immensely since incorporation and we are proud to provide every segment of society with a reliable link to the digital universe.

Our entire network topology is rugged, dynamic and fully redundant with negligible downtimes: content showing extremely high availability exceeding 99.5%. Our promise is to continue providing innovative solutions at the best feature-to-price and service-to-price ratio.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Field Engineer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Qualification and Skills


	High school diploma or equivalent; technical certifications or degree in a related field is a plus.
	Proven experience in network installations, preferably within an ISP or telecommunications environment.
	Strong knowledge of networking concepts, protocols, and equipment, such as routers, switches, modems, and cabling.
	Proficiency in troubleshooting network connectivity issues and resolving technical problems.
	Familiarity with various operating systems (Windows, Linux, macOS) and network diagnostic tools.
	Excellent communication and customer service skills to interact effectively with customers and internal teams.
	Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines in a field environment.
	Valid driver's license and willingness to travel to customer sites as required.
	Physical ability to lift and move networking equipment during installations.


Key Responsibilities
Installation and Configuration:


	Attending to customer premises to install and configure ISP services, including internet connectivity, routers, modems, and other networking equipment.
	Follow installation guidelines, technical specifications, and company procedures to ensure accurate setup and connectivity.
	Test and verify the performance of installed services to ensure they meet the desired speed, reliability, and quality standards.
	Educate customers on the proper use and maintenance of the installed equipment and services.


Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution:


	Diagnose and resolve technical issues related to network connectivity, equipment malfunction, or service disruptions.
	Respond to customer complaints or service requests in a timely manner and provide effective solutions to address their concerns.
	Collaborate with internal teams, such as coordinators, network operations and support, to escalate and resolve complex issues when necessary.
	Maintain detailed documentation of customer interactions, service requests, and problem resolutions.


Customer Service and Communication:


	Interact professionally and courteously with customers, ensuring a positive customer experience during the installation process.
	Communicate technical information to customers in a clear and understandable manner, addressing any questions or concerns they may have.
	Provide recommendations for improving network performance, equipment upgrades, or additional services based on customer requirements and industry best practices.
	Collaborate with sales teams or account managers to gather customer feedback and identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling services.


Quality Assurance and Compliance:


	Ensure installations are completed according to company standards, policies, and regulatory requirements.
	Perform regular audits and quality checks on installed services to identify any deficiencies and implement corrective actions.
	Stay updated with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices related to ISP installations to enhance service delivery and customer satisfaction.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@cobranet.ng using "Field Engineer" as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only qualified candidates will be shortlisted.    

    

        Click here to Apply

The Group is a dominant player in the transportation, powerand IT-enabled service sectors, which are critical to the sustained growth of the Nigerian Economy. The corporate vision of the Group is to provide innovative and quality products along with excellent after-sales service to our customers. The activities of the Group are guided by strong value systems built around Integrity, Innovation, Openness and Consistency.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Account Officer will be responsible for managing day-to-day financial transactions, maintaining accurate financial records, supporting financial reporting, and ensuring compliance with company policies and statutory requirements.
	The role requires a detail-oriented professional with 2&ndash;3 years of accounting experience.


Key Responsibilities


	Record and maintain accurate financial transactions in the accounting system
	Prepare and post journal entries, ledgers, and trial balances
	Handle accounts payable and accounts receivable functions
	Prepare invoices, receipts, and payment vouchers
	Reconcile bank statements and resolve discrepancies
	Support monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reporting
	Assist in budget preparation and cost monitoring
	Maintain proper documentation for financial records and audits
	Ensure compliance with tax regulations (VAT, WHT, PAYE where applicable)
	Support external and internal audit processes
	Monitor expenses and ensure adherence to approved budgets
	Liaise with vendors, clients, and internal departments on financial matters


Requirements


	BSc or HND in Accounting, Finance, or related discipline with 2&ndash;3 years of relevant work experience as an Account Officer or similar role
	Good knowledge of accounting principles and financial reporting
	Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Excel
	Basic understanding of Nigerian tax laws and statutory compliance
	Strong attention to detail and numerical accuracy
	Good organizational and time management skills
	Ability to work with minimal supervision


Skills and Competencies:


	Financial analysis and reporting
	Bookkeeping and reconciliation skills
	Problem-solving ability
	Confidentiality and integrity
	Good communication and interpersonal skills


Added Advantage:


	Professional certification (ICAN, ACCA, or ATS) in progress or completed
	Experience in [manufacturing / service / trading] industry

Account Officer Job at Simba Group




        
    

        
        Simba Group which started operations in 1988, is a conglomerate having a Pan-Nigeria presence and business interests in some ofthe most dynamic sectors in the economy. The Group is a dominant player in the transportation, powerand IT-enabled service sectors, which are critical to the sustained growth of the Nigerian Economy. The corporate vision of the Group is to provide innovative and quality products along with excellent after-sales service to our customers. The activities of the Group are guided by strong value systems built around Integrity, Innovation, Openness and Consistency.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer
     

            
    



Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Account Officer will be responsible for managing day-to-day financial transactions, maintaining accurate financial records, supporting financial reporting, and ensuring compliance with company policies and statutory requirements.
	The role requires a detail-oriented professional with 2–3 years of accounting experience.


Key Responsibilities


	Record and maintain accurate financial transactions in the accounting system
	Prepare and post journal entries, ledgers, and trial balances
	Handle accounts payable and accounts receivable functions
	Prepare invoices, receipts, and payment vouchers
	Reconcile bank statements and resolve discrepancies
	Support monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reporting
	Assist in budget preparation and cost monitoring
	Maintain proper documentation for financial records and audits
	Ensure compliance with tax regulations (VAT, WHT, PAYE where applicable)
	Support external and internal audit processes
	Monitor expenses and ensure adherence to approved budgets
	Liaise with vendors, clients, and internal departments on financial matters


Requirements


	BSc or HND in Accounting, Finance, or related discipline with 2–3 years of relevant work experience as an Account Officer or similar role
	Good knowledge of accounting principles and financial reporting
	Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Excel
	Basic understanding of Nigerian tax laws and statutory compliance
	Strong attention to detail and numerical accuracy
	Good organizational and time management skills
	Ability to work with minimal supervision


Skills and Competencies:


	Financial analysis and reporting
	Bookkeeping and reconciliation skills
	Problem-solving ability
	Confidentiality and integrity
	Good communication and interpersonal skills


Added Advantage:


	Professional certification (ICAN, ACCA, or ATS) in progress or completed
	Experience in [manufacturing / service / trading] industry
    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Marketing Digital Content Creator",
  "description": "Etcon Analytical and Environmental Systems &amp; Services Limited is a wholly Nigerian Company specialized in the sales, marketing, distribution, installation, startup and maintenance of various equipment in Nigeria Industries and Institutions. Our wide product selection allows us to offer various expert solutions which, when aligned with our strategy focuses on driving results, developing people, critical thinking, continual improvement &amp; innovation, collaboration &amp; teamwork and customer focus &ndash; guarantee the satisfaction of the needs of our clients. We see partnership as the foundation of our entire business rather than just a fancy word. This is what differentiates us. Therefore, we are committed to providing total solutions to all your demands.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Digital Content Creator
Job Location:&nbsp;Ogudu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Engaging and relevant digital content across various platforms, like blog posts, social media updates, videos, and infographics, to attract and inform potential customers, while aligning with the brand&#39;s marketing objectives, often incorporating SEO practices to maximize reach and visibility online.


Responsibilities


	Content ideation and planning:Brainstorming and developing content strategies aligned with marketing goals, identifying target audience interests, and creating content calendars.
	Writing and editing content:Crafting compelling blog posts, articles, social media captions, website copy, email newsletters, and other digital content, ensuring proper grammar and style.
	Visual content creation:Producing or managing the creation of graphics, infographics, videos, and other visual content to enhance engagement.
	SEO optimization:Incorporating relevant keywords and optimizing content for search engine ranking to increase organic traffic.
	Social media management:Posting and scheduling content across various social media platforms, engaging with followers, and monitoring analytics.
	Content promotion and distribution:Utilizing various channels like email marketing, social media campaigns, influencer partnerships to reach the target audience.
	Analytics and reporting:Tracking key metrics like website traffic, social media engagement, and lead generation to measure content performance and identify areas for improvement.
	Collaboration with marketing teams:Working closely with marketing teams to align content strategy with overall marketing campaigns and objectives.
	Staying updated on trends:Keeping abreast of the latest digital marketing trends, emerging platforms, and best practices for content creation.


Qualifications


	B.Sc Degree in Marketing and Computer Science.
	3 - 5 years of relevant work experience.


Skills required :


	Excellent writing and editing skills.
	Understanding of SEO principles.
	Visual design and multimedia skills.
	Social media marketing expertise.
	Strong communication and collaboration skills.
	Analytical skills to interpret data and measure performance.
	Knowledge of content management systems (CMS).


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to:&nbsp;hr@etconanalytical.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-16",

Marketing Digital Content Creator Job at Etcon Analytical & Environmental Systems & Services Limited




        
    

        
        Etcon Analytical and Environmental Systems & Services Limited is a wholly Nigerian Company specialized in the sales, marketing, distribution, installation, startup and maintenance of various equipment in Nigeria Industries and Institutions. Our wide product selection allows us to offer various expert solutions which, when aligned with our strategy focuses on driving results, developing people, critical thinking, continual improvement & innovation, collaboration & teamwork and customer focus – guarantee the satisfaction of the needs of our clients. We see partnership as the foundation of our entire business rather than just a fancy word. This is what differentiates us. Therefore, we are committed to providing total solutions to all your demands.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Digital Content Creator
Job Location: Ogudu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Engaging and relevant digital content across various platforms, like blog posts, social media updates, videos, and infographics, to attract and inform potential customers, while aligning with the brand's marketing objectives, often incorporating SEO practices to maximize reach and visibility online.


Responsibilities


	Content ideation and planning:Brainstorming and developing content strategies aligned with marketing goals, identifying target audience interests, and creating content calendars.
	Writing and editing content:Crafting compelling blog posts, articles, social media captions, website copy, email newsletters, and other digital content, ensuring proper grammar and style.
	Visual content creation:Producing or managing the creation of graphics, infographics, videos, and other visual content to enhance engagement.
	SEO optimization:Incorporating relevant keywords and optimizing content for search engine ranking to increase organic traffic.
	Social media management:Posting and scheduling content across various social media platforms, engaging with followers, and monitoring analytics.
	Content promotion and distribution:Utilizing various channels like email marketing, social media campaigns, influencer partnerships to reach the target audience.
	Analytics and reporting:Tracking key metrics like website traffic, social media engagement, and lead generation to measure content performance and identify areas for improvement.
	Collaboration with marketing teams:Working closely with marketing teams to align content strategy with overall marketing campaigns and objectives.
	Staying updated on trends:Keeping abreast of the latest digital marketing trends, emerging platforms, and best practices for content creation.


Qualifications


	B.Sc Degree in Marketing and Computer Science.
	3 - 5 years of relevant work experience.


Skills required :


	Excellent writing and editing skills.
	Understanding of SEO principles.
	Visual design and multimedia skills.
	Social media marketing expertise.
	Strong communication and collaboration skills.
	Analytical skills to interpret data and measure performance.
	Knowledge of content management systems (CMS).


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: hr@etconanalytical.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Customer Service Representative",
  "description": "The Beginner Base is a marketplace consultancy that helps small and growing businesses increase sales and improve their customer experience. We offer bespoke solutions to enable these businesses to maintain a fair market share and continue to scale.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Representative

Job Location:&nbsp;Ketu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	Join our team as a Customer Service Representative and help customers discover great products through social media.


Your role will involve:


	Engaging with customers on WhatsApp and Instagram.
	Assisting them in finding suitable products.
	Sharing product details and making recommendations.

Customer Service Representative Job at Beginner Base




        
    

        
        The Beginner Base is a marketplace consultancy that helps small and growing businesses increase sales and improve their customer experience. We offer bespoke solutions to enable these businesses to maintain a fair market share and continue to scale.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Representative

Job Location: Ketu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	Join our team as a Customer Service Representative and help customers discover great products through social media.


Your role will involve:
     

            
    




	Engaging with customers on WhatsApp and Instagram.
	Assisting them in finding suitable products.
	Sharing product details and making recommendations.
	Ensuring a positive customer experience.
	Familiarity with social media platforms.
	A proactive and helpful attitude.
	Basic computer skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their current updated CV to: admin@beginnersbase.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Important Notes


	Please only apply if you reside near the Ketu, Oregun, Ojota, or Mile 12 axis.
	No Accommodation Provision.
	Must have completed NYSC or N/A
	For more inquiries, WhatsApp: 07018074104.
    

    

        Click here to Apply
